DS3231_CONSTRUCTOR_TOOLTIP: Create DS3231 RTC instance on specified I2C bus
DS3231_READ_FIELD_TOOLTIP: Read selected field from the RTC
DS3231_READ_ARRAY_TOOLTIP: Read date/time as array [year, month, date, day, hours, minutes, seconds]
DS3231_SET_TIME_MESSAGE0: set $[RTC_INSTANCE] time: Y $[YEAR] M $[MONTH] D $[DATE] W $[DAY] H $[HOURS] M $[MINUTES] S $[SECONDS]
DS3231_SET_TIME_TOOLTIP: Set date and time on the RTC
DS3231_READ_TEMPERATURE_TOOLTIP: Read RTC internal temperature in degrees Celsius
